alert.note: Alert for Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 11:05AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Glasgow MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Poplar River Near Poplar affecting Roosevelt County. For the Poplar River...including Poplar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poplar River Near Poplar. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Low lying areas near gage site begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.2 feet on 03/11/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM MDT.
